metadata.title: CVE-2023-46749 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache Shiro before 1.13.0 or 2.0.0-alpha-4, may be susceptible to a pathtraversal attack that results in an authentication bypass when usedtogether with path rewriting Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.13.0+ or2.0.0-alpha-4+, or ensure `blockSemicolon` is enabled (this is thedefault).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46749` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-5ubuntu0.24.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: shiro package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-5ubuntu0.24.04.1~esm1').
